mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_HOMEPAGE_INFO( IDX_HOMEPAGE_INFO, HOMEPAGE_ADMIN, HOMEPAGE_ADMIN_PNUM, IS_CURRENT, EMAIL, REG_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_HOMEPAGE_INFO.NEXTVAL, #{homepage_admin}, #{homepage_admin_pnum}, #{is_current}, #{email}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT IDX_HOMEPAGE_INFO, HOMEPAGE_ADMIN, HOMEPAGE_ADMIN_PNUM, IS_CURRENT, EMAIL, REG_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by #{order_field} DESC) AS row_num ,IDX_HOMEPAGE_INFO, HOMEPAGE_ADMIN, HOMEPAGE_ADMIN_PNUM, IS_CURRENT, EMAIL, REG_DATE FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_HOMEPAGE_INFO WHERE IS_CURRENT = 0 OR IS_CURRENT = 1 order by IDX_HOMEPAGE_INFO desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page_num}*#{amount} ) WHERE row_num > (#{page_num} -1)*#{amount}
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM TB_HOMEPAGE_INFO WHERE IS_CURRENT = 0 OR IS_CURRENT = 1
